definition: a rounded part of a cylindrical instrument (usually at one end)
details:
noun
- a rounded part of a cylindrical instrument (usually at one end)
= example: a rounded part of a cylindrical instrument (usually at one end)
- electric lamp consisting of a transparent or translucent glass housing containing a wire filament (usually tungsten) that emits light when heated by electricity
= synonyms: light bulb, lightbulb, incandescent lamp, electric light, electric-light bulb
- a rounded dilation or expansion in a canal or vessel or organ
- lower or hindmost part of the brain
= synonyms: medulla, medulla oblongata
- a modified bud consisting of a thickened globular underground stem serving as a reproductive structure
- anything with a round shape resembling a teardrop
